00016 template<class Base>
00017 class TMultiViewExtenderDelegatorCompWrap:
00018                      public Base,
00019                      virtual public iqt2d::IViewExtender
00020 {
00021 public:
00022        typedef Base BaseClass;
00023 
00024        I_BEGIN_COMPONENT(TMultiViewExtenderDelegatorCompWrap);
00025               I_REGISTER_INTERFACE(iqt2d::IViewExtender);
00026               I_ASSIGN_MULTI_0(m_slaveExtendersCompPtr, "SlaveSceneExtenders", "List of the slave scene extenders", false);
00027        I_END_COMPONENT;
00028 
00029        // reimplemented (iqt2d::IViewExtender)
00030        virtual void AddItemsToScene(iqt2d::IViewProvider* providerPtr, int flags);
00031        virtual void RemoveItemsFromScene(iqt2d::IViewProvider* providerPtr);
00032 
00033 private:
00034        I_MULTIREF(iqt2d::IViewExtender, m_slaveExtendersCompPtr);
00035 };

00038 // reimplemented (iqt2d::IViewExtender)
00039 
00040 template<class Base>
00041 void TMultiViewExtenderDelegatorCompWrap<Base>::AddItemsToScene(iqt2d::IViewProvider* providerPtr, int flags)
00042 {
00043        if (m_slaveExtendersCompPtr.IsValid()){
00044               int count = m_slaveExtendersCompPtr.GetCount();
00045               for (int i = 0; i < count; i++){
00046                      if (m_slaveExtendersCompPtr[i] != NULL){
00047                             m_slaveExtendersCompPtr[i]->AddItemsToScene(providerPtr, flags);
00048                      }
00049               }
00050        }
00051 }
00052 
00053 
00054 template<class Base>
00055 void TMultiViewExtenderDelegatorCompWrap<Base>::RemoveItemsFromScene(iqt2d::IViewProvider* providerPtr)
00056 {
00057        if (m_slaveExtendersCompPtr.IsValid()){
00058               int count = m_slaveExtendersCompPtr.GetCount();
00059               for (int i = 0; i < count; i++){
00060                      if (m_slaveExtendersCompPtr[i] != NULL){
00061                             m_slaveExtendersCompPtr[i]->RemoveItemsFromScene(providerPtr);
00062                      }
00063               }
00064        }
00065 }
